org.lightningj.paywall.btcpayserver.vo

Class Token

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.JSONParsable
      • org.lightningj.paywall.btcpayserver.vo.Token

  • public class Token
extends JSONParsable
    Value object class representing one serializable Token. Has the following values: token : the server generated token value (Required) expireDate : the date the token expires (Optional) facade : the facade of the token, merchant, pos ... Created by Philip Vendil on 2018-10-13.

      • Token

        public Token(java.lang.String id,
             java.lang.String token,
             java.time.Instant expireDate,
             BTCPayServerFacade facade)
        Default constructor for a BTC Pay Server Token
        Parameters:
        id - the SIN value of the public key
        token - the token value
        expireDate - the expire instant of this token.
        facade - the facade this token is valid for.

      • Token

             java.lang.String label,
             BTCPayServerFacade facade)
        Constructor when creating a Token for fetching from BTC Pay SErver
        Parameters:
        id - the SIN value of the public key
        label - name of this requesting application.
        facade - the facade this token is valid for.
